title: A Match for Melissa
description: This inspirational Regency romance is set in 1816 England. Melissa Southwoodâ€™s wealthy merchant father desires her to marry into the aristocracy, and he arranges for Lord Peter Winstead to court her. Melissa submits to the plan, but retains the right of final refusal. Lord Mark Russell, also throws his hat into the ring.	But a shocking event ensues. Traumatized by abduction, will Melissa be able to grasp true love?
author: Susan Karsten
